channel.title: Need help. have problems adding a noob quest :S rep++

item.title: Need help. have problems adding a noob quest :S rep++
item.dc:creator: @neroxx neroxx
item.description:
@neroxx wrote:

hey guys, i have made a quest now, everything workk fine, but when i have gaved the man 10 fetahers, also what he ask about, he asks again, and i just see that it comes “you have completed this quest” very fast, and then goes back, and so the man asks again :S

this is how him ask’s:

if(NPCID == 2244 && (playerLevel[3] >= 1 )) { talk2("Hello Sir, I have a quest for you", "Bring me 10 feathers and you'll get a great reward!", 2244); NpcDialogueSend = false;

and this is what he sais when its completed:

if(NPCID == 2244 && (playerHasItem(314, 10)) && (playerLevel[3] >= 3 )) { talk2("Thank you sir! Enjoy your", "reward!", 2244); NpcDialogueSend = false; deleteItem(314, 10); addSkillXP(10000, 3); addItem(995, 100000);

so… what do i fail?? please help, i will rep++ you if you wanna help me just reply :D:D

Read full topic
item.source: Need help. have problems adding a noob quest :S rep++
